title: Tuna and cannellini bean salad
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins cannellini beans', '400g tinned tuna packed in olive oil', '1 small red onion, thinly sliced', '1/2 fennel bulb, thinly sliced', 'juice of half an orange', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '2 to 3 sage leaves, finely chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil']
